original_title: Armor for Sleep Presents a Comprehensive Guide to Touring
overview: Culled from over a year's worth of touring and includes photos, cast and crew bios, live footage and interviews. An in-depth look at Armor For Sleep at home, on the road, and everything in between. Over 90 minutes of exclusive footage during the initial tours following the release of "What To Do When You Are Dead."
title: Armor for Sleep Presents a Comprehensive Guide to Touring
